posts.title: Cozmo The Real Life Robot
posts.content: Cozmo the real life robot is the pint-sized gadget with a big brain and even bigger personality. He moves around on treads, is programmed with hundreds of expressions, and features a unique personality  that is designed to evolve the more you interact with him.

posts.title: The Foot Gym
posts.content: Treat a range of foot related issues like Plantar Fasciitis and Achilles Tendinitis by hitting the foot gym. It comes with a range of resistance bands that you pull with your toes to strengthen your muscles and increase your stability.

posts.title: Grilled Jesus Sandwich Press
posts.content: Turn your next meal into a divine culinary experience by making yourself a grilled Cheesus using this mildly blasphemous sandwich press. It will burn the face of our lord and savior onto your sandwich, which will go perfect with a glass full of the blood of Christ.

posts.title: Zombie Hand Guitar Hanger
posts.content: Give your room an eerie touch that’ll freak out your band mates by hanging your ax on this zombie hand guitar hanger. This easy to adjust hanger swivels to accommodate your guitar’s style and features a cushioned insert to protect the neck of your instrument.

posts.title: Sandbox Bench
posts.content: Bring the park to your backyard with this fun and functional sandbox bench. Rather than forcing your kids to sit in the sand, it provides two wooden benches in addition to a nice overhead cover to protect from the sun on those hot summer days.

posts.title: Indoor Virtual Bike Trainer
posts.content: Get a grueling workout without having to endure any of the adverse outdoor weather conditions using this indoor virtual bike trainer. It features a wheel off design to eliminate tire wear and provides a realistic road feel while you ride.

posts.title: Neighbors Have Better Stuff Mat
posts.content: Improve your home security without incurring expensive security system costs – these welcome mats let any potential burglar know the contents of your home pale in comparison too your neighbors – despite your disposition for buying overpriced junk from this website.

posts.title: Star Wars Droid Inventor Kit
posts.content: Help your little Padawans one-up Anakin by having them build their own droid using this Star Wars droid inventor kit. The kit includes everything your little engineers will need to build a cool little R2 unit without any help from grown-ups.

posts.title: Playground Sand Excavator Toy
posts.content: One up everybody at the sandbox by digging your very own monstrous holes with this playground sand excavator toy. You’ll be able to sit comfortable and operate a tough crane like shovel that does all of the dirty work.

posts.title: Razer Mamba Gaming Mouse
posts.content: Take your gaming skills to the next level with the Razer Mamba wireless gaming mouse. With gaming-grade wireless technology, a 4G dual sensor system, multi-color lighting, and up to 200 inches per second / 50g acceleration – it’s the only mouse you’ll ever need.

posts.title: Multi Purpose Eating Utensil
posts.content: It may not include a sharp saw or screw driver, but the multi-purpose eating utensil will come in more handy than any other pocket knife you’ve ever owned. Equipped with a knife, spoon, and fork, this eating utensil is essential for camping or living as a hobo.

posts.title: Medieval Knight Egg Holder
posts.content: Hear ye, hear ye, the courageous and noble medieval knight egg holder has returned from his noble quest and is here to lend a helping <del>hand</del> spoon. Styled like a brave medieval knight, the holder keeps your boiled egg safe until you peel back its shining armor and dig in.
